definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end

sentences.english: Beth kept on, with only slight relapses into idleness or grieving.
sentences.chinese: 只有貝思堅持不懈，極少躲懶或悲天憫人。

sentences.english: Because of his long-term unremitting efforts, he finally won his the laurel of "The Sage of Calligraphy".
sentences.chinese: 長期堅持不懈的努力，終於使他贏得“書聖”的桂冠。

sentences.english: We always keep unremitting efforts to pursue the excellence quality.
sentences.chinese: 我們始終保持不懈的努力，以追求卓越品質。

sentences.english: It is Huiying's unremitting pursuit to construct a harmonious and coexistent atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 構建和諧共處的企業氛圍是匯英人不懈的追求。

sentences.english: Finally, he sweated the stamp for 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 經過五年的不懈努力，他終於搞到了那張郵票。

sentences.english: It is unremitting pursuit of Sanjing people to provide services for human health.
sentences.chinese: “爲人類的健康服務”一直是三精人的不懈追求。

sentences.english: So we must dig and delve unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們必須不懈地探索深究。

sentences.english: "Make steady st-rides and innovate constantly. "That is our unremitting pursuit.
sentences.chinese: “穩中求進，不斷創新”是我們不懈的追求。

sentences.english: And inorder to imptove national economy and to be the world famous brand.
sentences.chinese: 爲振興民族經濟，爭創世界名牌作出我們不懈的努力。

sentences.english: Most of all, the prime minister can thank his long-serving team of advisers and fixers .
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是首相要感謝顧問團隊及調停者的不懈努力。

sentences.english: The successful launch was a testament to the value of perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 這次成功的發射證明了堅持不懈是多麼可貴。

sentences.english: Make sure you capture these attributes for your use cases diligently.
sentences.chinese: 請確定你在堅持不懈地爲你的用例捕獲這些屬性。

sentences.english: For centuries, nay, millenniums, men have been trying to figure out how to have more sex.
sentences.chinese: 多少個世紀了，男人們一直在不懈地尋找這種祕方。

sentences.english: But through good and evil I stuck to my books.
sentences.chinese: 不過，好也罷歹也罷，讀書我倒是堅持不懈。

sentences.english: He struggled pertinaciously for the new resolution.
sentences.chinese: 他爲了這項新決議而不懈努力。

sentences.english: By my remorseless great efforts, i met him finally.
sentences.chinese: 經過我堅持不懈的努力，我終於認識了他。

definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to chip away at a task and not abandon it (idiom); to chisel away at sth/to persevere/unflagging efforts
lit. diligent and never slacking (idiom); continuous concentrated effort/assiduous (in study)/to concentrate
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to stick to sth without change (idiom); to persevere
to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
